post:
We have now launched KVM VPS in Jacksonville, Florida (1 more location coming soon), our other locations are New York and Los Angeles

**Looking Glass:**
Network Looking Glass for LA  – https://lg.hosteons.com
Network Looking Glass for NY – http://lg.ny.hosteons.com
Network Looking Glass for Jacksonville (JAX) – https://lg.jax.hosteons.com

**KVM VPS 1:**
CPU Core: 1
RAM: 512 MB
RAID 10 SSD: 5 GB
100 Mbps Unmetered
Location: Jacksonville (Florida)

~~$3~~ $2.1 (Use coupon "JAX30")

Order Link: https://my.hosteons.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=100

**KVM VPS 2:**
CPU Core: 2
RAM: 1GB
RAID 10 SSD: 10 GB
100 Mbps Unmetered
Location: Jacksonville (Florida)

~~$4~~ $2.8 (Use coupon "JAX30")

**KVM VPS 3:**
CPU Core: 2
RAM: 1.5GB
RAID 10 SSD: 15 GB
100 Mbps Unmetered
Location: Jacksonville (Florida)

~~$5~~ $3.5 (Use coupon "JAX30")

More VPS Packages available at https://hosteons.com/vps.php


Other Free Goodies:

1) Free Blest License 
2) Free Direct Admin (Use coupon "DA" to get free Direct Admin on VPS 2 and higher VPS Packages)
3) Free Windows 2019 License on annual payments (Applicable on KVM VPS 3 and higher packages as it's minimum requirement to run Windows)


24x7 Support

All popular modes of payments are accepted.
